course_description: This course focuses on the conservation of biodiversity and introduces students to ways that ecological and evolutionary principles can be used to conserve and protect species and ecosystems at risk.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131or ENVS_ OX 131 or OX BIOL 111  or BIOL 142 or  BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:15am in Math & Science Center - N304
